Spells:
Barkskin (D2 Tran): Touched gains +3 natural armor for 70 min
Call Lightning (D3 Evoc): R170' 1 bolt/rd inflicts 3d6 HP (DC 17 Ref half) for 7 min or 7 bolts
Create Water (D0 Conj): R40' Creates 14 gallons of pure water
Detect Magic (D0 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on magical auras for conc or 7 min
Entangle (D1 Tran): R680' Creatures in 40' radius entangled for 7 min (DC 15 Ref neg)
Flaming Sphere (D2 Evoc): R170' 5' diameter sphere inflicts 3d6 HP (DC 16 Ref neg), jumps or moves 30'/rd for 7 rd
Flare (D0 Evoc): R40' Target dazzled (DC 14 Fort neg) for 1 min
Gust Of Wind (D2 Evoc): 60' 50 MPH gust affects medium or smaller creatures (DC 16 Fort neg) for 1 rd
Ice Storm (D4 Evoc): R680' Hail in 20' radius inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning, 2d6 HP cold, and -4 Perception for 7 rd
Jump (D1 Tran): Touched +20 Acrobatics (jump) for 7 min
Light (D0 Evoc): Touched gives 20' normal light for 70 min
Magic Stone (D1 Tran): 3 touched stones attack at +1 and inflict 1d6+1 HP (2d6+2 HP vs. undead) for 30 min
Pass Without Trace (D1 Tran): 7 touched leave no tracks or scent for 7 hr
Poison (D3 Necr): Touched suffers -1d3 Constitution/rd for 6 rd (DC 17 Fort neg)
Read Magic (D0 Divi): Self can read magical writing for 70 min
Resist Energy (D2 Abju): Touched gains resistance 20 to chosen energy for 70 min
Sleet Storm (D3 Conj): R680' Sleet in 40' radius binds, inflicts DC 10 Acrobatics to move for 7 rd
Speak With Animals (D1 Divi): Self converses w/animals for 7 min
Spider Climb (D2 Tran): Touched gains 20' climb speed and can climb walls and ceilings for 70 min
Stabilize (D0 Conj): R40' Stabilizes target w/negative HP
Summon Nature's Ally I (D1 Conj): R40' 1 1st-level creature appears and fights foes for 7 rd
Summon Nature's Ally IV (D4 Conj): R40' 1 4th-, 1d3 3rd-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 7 rd

Wisdom Druid Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level D1, D2, D3, D4

Natural Spell: May cast spells during Wild Shape
Spontaneous Druid Spell: May cast Summon Nature's Ally in place of known spell
